about_the_game:
Wool at the Gates is a strategy game where you build up your city over a series of increasingly difficult rounds to defend it from waves of invading sheep. Humans, Orcs, and Elves fight together to stop the sheep from overrunning the city. Carefully balance your economy and defenses to survive each round. Unpack layers of strategy to optimize building types and locations while stacking class types to create powerful synergies. Replay levels with unique combinations of faction and class types to complete new challenges and gain rewards.

Gameplay

  • Base building: Build and upgrade structures like towers, walls, and resource-generating buildings to grow your economy and defend against hordes of sheep

  • Round-based levels: Take your time building each round before the next wave begins, progressing through a series of increasingly difficult rounds per level 

  • Auto-battler inspired synergies: Choose towers, troops, and hero abilities of the same class to uniquely power up your hero and all characters of that class

  • Factions unite: Mix and match Humans, Orcs, and Elves when building your city to gain unique perks from each faction

  • Hero or God: Fight alongside troops in your hero form or shapeshift into a flying eyeball to quickly traverse the landscape. Choose new hero abilities as you progress through a level

  • Command troops: Set up your troops before the battle begins and command them during the fight 

Other Features

  • Each map introduces new enemy types and challenges that can be completed to gain rewards and unlocks

  • Multiple heroes and abilities to choose from

  • 3 factions + 9 class types, each with unique perks and synergy power-ups

  • Variety of tower and troop types, each belonging to a unique combination of faction and classes
